```{r}
library(sf)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(scales)
```

```{r}
muns <- st_transform(st_read("../processed_data/municipalities/municipalities.shp"), crs=4326)
cantons <-  st_transform(st_read("../processed_data/cantons/cantons.shp"), crs=4326)
typ <-  st_transform(st_read("../processed_data/typology/typology.shp"), crs=4326)
ch <-  st_transform(st_read("../processed_data/switzerland/switzerland.shp"), crs=4326)
```

```{r}
st_drop_geometry(ch)[1, "p_rf_fac"]
```


```{r}
years <- seq(2004, 2022)

wadi <- muns %>% 
  filter(name == "W채denswil") %>%
  select(starts_with("gwh") & !ends_with("tot")) %>%
  st_drop_geometry()

zh <- cantons %>% 
  filter(name == "Z체rich") %>%
  select(starts_with("gwh") & !ends_with("tot")) %>%
  st_drop_geometry()

to_visualize <- data.frame(years = years, gwh = cumsum(c(wadi[1,])), name="W채denswil")

to_visualize <- rbind(to_visualize, data.frame(years = years, gwh = cumsum(c(zh[1,])), name="Z체rich"))

ggplot() +
  geom_line(to_visualize, mapping=aes(x=years, y=gwh, col=name))
```

```{r}
ggplot() +
  geom_point(data=muns, mapping=aes(x=pol_or, y = gwh_tot / p_rf_fac), size=0.2) +
  labs(title = "Political orientation vs exhaustion of PV potential at municipality level", x="Political orientation", y="Exhaustion [%]", col="") +
  scale_y_continuous(labels= percent_format(accuracy = 1, scale = 100)) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks=c(-1, 0, 1),
                     labels=c("left-leaning", "centrist", "right-leaning")) +
  theme_classic()
```
